parameters.mntlhlth: For how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health, which includes stress, depression, and problems with emotions, not good?
parameters.hrsrelax: After an average work day, about how many hours do you have to relax or pursue activities that you enjoy
parameters.grass: Do you think the use of marijuana should be made legal, or not?

title: 2010 General Social Survey
